UPDATE business
img_file_name = #{imgFileName},
title = #{title},
subtitle = #{subtitle},
price = #{price},
distance = #{distance},
`desc` = #{desc},
city = #{city},
category = #{category}
WHERE id=#{id}

UPDATE business b, (SELECT business_id,create_time,COUNT(*) cou FROM orders
WHERE (SELECT TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND,#{startTime},create_time)) >= 0
GROUP BY business_id) c SET b.number=b.number + c.cou WHERE b.id=c.business_id
